roleset.name: cover with a liquid
roleset.note: DOUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'douse' based on ectb2 instances. VerbNet entry 9.8, comparison with 'flood.' (from douse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: He-1 tried * using deliberately crumpled paper * to produce a mottled effect with the ink, and worked on a blurring effect, achieved * by *-1 briefly dousing a freshly painted silk scroll in water.
